item.title: Safe dumped on drive to church, 29th December
item.description:
Not on church property but is on drive to church, on right as you drive up the hill. It's been there for ages. I reported it in September but it was not removed. Exact point on drive is guess, so please look up and down drive. It's only a couple of feet from the kerb

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): One Tree Hill, Nunhead, Greater London

item.title: Flytipped mattress between allotment and outbuilding, 29th December
item.description:
There is a flytipped mattress and other rubbish in the space between the allotment fence and a small building. It is near 29 Borland Road, directly to the right of the allotment gate, by the tree. There is a similar resolved report on this location, but the mattress is still there. It has been there for a few months. Please remove it asap. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Borland Road, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Safety fence cut and collapsed on green at Okemore Gardens, 29th December
item.description:
A section of the wooden safety fence on the green at Okemore Gardens has been deliberately cut and is now broken and lying on the ground. Multiple fence rails and supports are detached, leaving the area completely unfenced. This is immediately next to a pedestrian path and close to the road, presenting an urgent safety risk, particularly for children, pedestrians and pets who could easily access the road. The damage has been present for several days and requires prompt repair to prevent injury or further incidents

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crockenhill Road, St Mary Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rattling, noisy manhole cover, 29th December
item.description:
Recurring noisy loose /rattling manhole cover in the middle of the road near the junction between Alexandra Park Road and Rosebery Road. This was repaired last year, but the flooring has become loose again. Location is roughly outside 91 Alexandra Park Road. Every time a vehicle drives over it there is a loud 'CLUNK-CLICK' which happens every few seconds throughout the day and night, making it hard to sleep or relax. VERY DISTRESSING!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Alexandra Park Road, Muswell Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect Signage & Broken Fence, 29th December
item.description:
Car Park was Closed all day. Called Numbers displayed on sign. Bromley Council - Not recognised, Ward Security - didn't want to know!! Fence has been damaged / removed to allow cars over grass. Sign has incorrect numbers and opening times. It was agreed with Cllr Colin Smith a long time ago M-F open at 09:00 to stop commuters parking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tent Peg Lane, Petts Wood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large fireworks sign on pavement outside fish and chip shop, 29th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, Greater London
